## Preparation of the working environment

:::{.incremental}
1. Create an account on the [SSP Cloud](https://datalab.sspcloud.fr/home) using your professional mail address
2. Launch a `MLflow` service by clicking this [URL](https://datalab.sspcloud.fr/launcher/automation/mlflow?autoLaunch=false)
3. Launch a `VSCode` service by clicking this [URL](https://datalab.sspcloud.fr/launcher/ide/vscode-python?autoLaunch=false&git.repository=«https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FInseeFrLab%2Fformation-mlops.git»&git.cache=«999999»&init.personalInit=«https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2FInseeFrLab%2Fformation-mlops%2Fmain%2Fsetup.sh»)
4. In the terminal, move the current directory to the `formation-mlops` project : <br/>
    + `Menu` → `Terminal` → `New Terminal`
    + `cd formation-mlops`
5. You're all set !
:::
